node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，7 月 22 日出現症狀，與第 #2052 宗個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history and developed symptoms on July 22. Her case is epidemiologically related to the case of patient #2052.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en:
The Salvation Army Lung Hang
Residence For Senior Citizens
groups.description_zh: 大圍救世軍隆亨長者之家的院友、廚師、清潔工、文職人員及其家人共十多人先後確診。
groups.description_en: This clusters accounts for the residents of The Salvation Army Lung Hang Residence For Senior Citizens, as well as related cooks, janitors, administrative staff, and family members. The cluster numbers at over ten people.

node.location_en: Ying Chuen House, Shui Chuen O Estate
